purpose: Facilitate the development and deployment of secure, scalable AI agent infrastructures.
principle: Built on a modular architecture with components for authentication, observability, debugging, telemetry, and runtime management.
reusability: Designed as a plug-and-play framework with API support for easy integration into existing systems.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage; may have stability issues and limited documentation.
name: golf
description: Production-Ready MCP Server Framework • Build, deploy & scale secure AI agent infrastructure • Includes Auth, Observability, Debugger, Telemetry & Runtime • Run real-world MCPs powering AI Agents
highlight: Comprehensive framework for building and scaling secure AI agent infrastructures with built-in support for authentication, observability, and telemetry.
